name: BEAT THE GOBBLINS
description:
Survive for as long as you can and see if you can BEAT THE GOBBLINS.

Built in the awesome quadplay engine by @CasualEffects!

Works best in safari or chrome.

Sound on!

Controls:

  • keyboard: arrow keys or wasd to move, space bar to swing
  • ps4/switch/8bitdo should be supported

Credits:

  • Game:
    • Stephan Steinbach @stephan_gfx
    • Ed Luong
  • Music:
    • Marlena Fecho
  • Engine & Optimization:
    • Morgan McGuire @CasualEffects

Advice/Testing/Feedback:

Stevel LaVietes, Andrew McDonnell, Jon Morley, Jacob Creed, Forrester Cole, Yon Lee, Mark Harris, Josh Minor, Nick Porcino, Chris Hui, Katherine Bamford.

Engine:  Quadplay Engine

Source Code:  Source (In the quadplay distribution)

Also thanks to @mossmouth, @strotchy and friends for the UFO-50 palette, it was super helpful in making this game!
